job.title: Computer Vision / Machine Learning Senior Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtthe acvml rampampd team at arkit is looking for an excellent cvml engineer to work on real time visual place recognition systems our team provides an environment with a good balance between pragmatism and technical expertise applied to real problems the main goal of this position is to support relocalization for insideoutside slam systems on multiple platforms with different hw specs this is an exciting role where the candidate will have the opportunity to interact with interdisciplinary teams and top researchers to achieve the best quality and performanceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt excellent cv foundations able to resolve problems involving multiple view geometryltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt excellent ml foundations for vision based patter recognition and visual perception problemsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt proven expertise on visual place recognition for localization systems is a plusltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt proven expertise in developing real time systemsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt knowledge of dl frameworks such caffe pytorch or tensorflowltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt experience with c c python ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt solid knowledge of public apple frameworks such coreml metal is a plusltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtcomputer vision vision for robotics ar or at least years of validated expertise on similar roles projectsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtphd or msc in computer science or similarltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtrole number ltbrgtltbrgt
